https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3SvYxaqotWivLP4fiOd4lQ7IuXq.jpg The owner of a small-town junkyard offers a cash reward to whomever can kill her uninvited, space-suited alien guest when its spacecraft crash-lands into her barn. Every wacko within 100 miles turns out, and before long, the junkyard is transformed into a war zone of man vs. man vs. machine vs. alien vs. God only knows what. Alien Opponent
